reviews.review: I haven't finished the game yet, but it is so awesome! This game blows my expectations away every time I play it. Unlike other games, you can be walking along a plank only for it to break, or you just fall off, and you have to find another way up. This game is so flexible. With the realistic physics, it makes the game far more immersive than most modern aaa games. The puzzles are very subtle most of the time, unlike most other puzzle games where you can tell it's a room with a puzzle to solve to get out. In this game, the puzzles are more tactile, like "How to I get up to there? I'll stack boxes" "How do I get to that ramp? Blow open this tunnel with the explosive barrel." This game has no cutscenes, too, so your first person immersion is never broken. The only thing that I would like them to fix would be the loading times. I have an ssd, but the game still stops at certain points to load more of the environment.

Un juego mítico de la plataforma y que a mi opinión es una compra más que obligada en el mundo del gaming. 
Un gran salto evolutivo que trajo grandes mecánicas como la arma de gravedad, motores de físicas y grandes mapas. Esto en parte se da por el renovado Source así que sabemos a quien agradecerles. 
La historia crece en varios sentidos y se expande de los sucedido en Black Mesa, ahora transportandonos a una ciudad devastada y bajo la tiranía de una raza extraterreste.
Si bien mejora en muchos apartados, en otros se dejan de lado… Una de estas cosas es la linealidad de niveles, que si bien siguen estando esta se combina con hermosos tramos de mapas abiertos como el de la ciudad de la costa.
Un juego lleno de misterios, terror y más acción que nunca, un juego que se recomienda casi que obligadamente por lo que hizo en el ya lejanos 2004 y que aún sigue estando vigente, siendo precursor de muchos otros hermosos proyectos.
Play it, you won't regret it.
Buenardo

- Historia muy bien contada y muy intrigante (10/10)
- Jugabilidad excelente y muy desafiante (10/10)
- Diseño Sonoro sobresaliente y muy tenso a ratos (10/10)
- Gráficos muy vistosos, aunque han envejecido un poco (9.5/10)
- Diseño de niveles muy variado y sorprendente (10/10)
- Bastantes horas de juego, aunque poco rejugable (9.5/10)
Puntuación: 9.8 - Excelente juego

This game inspired a generation of games and is something i think every gamer should experience, but honestly, it struggles to hold up today. I just started replaying it and although I have fond memories of the game, all the problems really stand out the second time around. Its fun at times but really boring, confusing and stupidly easy at times. This is because of some annoying but very straight forward puzzles and completely brain dead AI, but if you can look past that, there are some very fun parts of this game that make it worth playing. Just wait until you get the gravity gun. The story is the real reason to play this game. It has a story like no other I've ever seen in a video game. With the annoying fact that the cut scenes are unskippable, the characters are gar deeper and more interesting than they were in the original half life, in which they were basically just fodder. Overall, still good, but with a lot of dumb mistakes.
Cmon, it's Half life. What's not to like?
Even after all this years its still a great game.
great game even 14 years after release

One of the most iconic games of all time. Half-Life 2 pioneered first-person shooters, physics, AI, and more, and it remains a masterclass in game design to this day.

More than a decade later, this game still holds up, and is still worth playing for any FPS-lover. The mechanics are clean and the story is well-told. Different segments offer unique challenges and puzzles that keep the game interesting from start to finish.

Игра-легенда. В своё время была топовая графика. В этой графике ничего лишнего, даже в 2020 году выглядит хорошо. Захватывающий сюжет. Из минусов хотелось учесть сложность некоторых заданий, когда первый раз игру проходишь(не подойдёт людям, которые на работе думают головой и после работы сесть и поиграть в такие игры). Это игра-не тупая бойня,  где нужно всех отстреливать, чтобы пройти по сюжету, в некоторых моментах нужно проявлять смекалку.

I know this is suppose to be some sort of genre-defining classic, but I hate first person shooters. This game did nothing to change my view of the shooter genre. Give me an open world sandbox game like the much maligned Fallout 76 any day of the week over this so called gem.

For those of you who happen to like these type of games, the game still looks pretty good. The puzzles are challenging without being too difficult. As for the negatives, there don't seem to be any sort of RPG elements. The world is one long tunnel with no sort of exploration whatsoever. If there is a great story, I never got far enough down the endless canals to find it. 

If you are a die-hard shooter fan, buy and try just to experience one of the turning points of the genre.

Шутер на все времена. Революционные в свое время технологии даже сейчас впечатляют. Дизайн антиутопичного постапокалиптического мира восточной Европы умопомрачителен своим контрастом знакомых мест в сочетании с монолитными чужеродными элементами инопланетного характера. Мастерская режиссура без единой кат-сцены, постоянное чередование сотен разнообразных ситуации: от исследования и головоломок, до поездок на транспорте и ураганных перестрелок. Незабываемый звуковой дизайн и музыка. Надеюсь, данный шедевр будут переиздавать на множество поколений вперед.
